alert.note: Alert for Eastern Antelope Valley Foothills; Eastern San Gabriel Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 14 at 9:41PM PDT until March 15 at 5:00AM PDT by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM PDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...South winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. Isolated gusts to 65 mph possible at times. * WHERE...Eastern San Gabriel Mountains and Eastern Antelope Valley Foothills. * WHEN...Until 5 AM PDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Roadways may be affected by gusty cross winds, including Highways 2 and 138. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Antelope Valley Foothills; Eastern San Gabriel Mountains
